remarks: An equivalence relation is reflexive on its field.  Compare Theorem 3M of [Enderton] p. 56.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ersymb.1 $e |- ( ph -> R Er X ) $.
erref.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
erref $p |- ( ph -> A R A ) $.
